apa ese gananaya kalath, suddhodana raju masayakata eka bagin amathiyan eewa atha.

thel swalpayak aalepa karamin mapatangilla aadharayen kondu naratiya depasata therapima mangin da depa dige duwa yana wedanawa samanaya karagatha hakiya.sirure oonama sthanayaka athiwana thadabala wedanawak samanayata wilumbaata madak ihalin balanaharaya matha sidu karana mrudu therapimakata hakiyawa atha.boho roga samanaya karamin sirure athiwana wedanawan duru kirimata danahisata wiyathak pahalin jangasthiya saha anu jangasthiya athara (shariraye pita paththe) athi nilaya yodagatha hakiya.

mathiwarana komasaris deshapi්raya mahatha chanda wimasima awasana wimata maththen aarakshaka ansha anuyuktha kirima kisiseth nokala yuthuwa athayi awadharanaya kaleya.ethanin nonawathunu hethema chanda ganan kirime madhyasthana wala katayuthu badhawakin thorawa karagena ya haki paridi ema sthana walata awashya aarakshawa salasimata piyawarada gaththeya.deshapi්raya mahathage ha ohuge kandayame hasirima eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye atham balakanu wala ahe katu aninnakma wani wiya.namuth deshapi්raya mahathage karyabharaya agaya kala pudgalayoda wiya.aarakshaka anshaye ihala thanathuru daruwanda owun athara wiya.owunge sahayath,deshapi්raya mahathage kelin wada kirime piliwethath nisa chunda madhyasthana walata anuyuktha kara siti polis niladharihu thama rajakariya akuratama itu kalaha.namuth polisiyeda pakshaga්rahi pudgalayo siti bawa sathyaya.nishantha muthuhettigama amathyawaraya polisiyata pana polisiye radawa siti thama sahacharayin dedeneku balahathkarayen ragena giyeya.wipakshaye wedikawak gini thabiyayi owunata chodana nagi thibuni.ohuta erehiwa warenthu nikuth kara thibiyadi pawa ohu singappuruwa bala pitathwa giyeya.melesama thawath niyojya amathyawareyaku wana pe්ramalal jayasekara kahawaththe wipaksha deshapalana raliyakata sahabhagiwa siti pirisakata wedi thabiya.ohuwa athadanguwata ganimada magaharimin siti polisiya awasana pasugiyada ohuwa thama bharayata gaththeya.

mulu ratama rajapaksha pawul palanayata yatath wuye yayi kima athishayokthiyak nowanneya. 18wani wyawastha sanshodhanaya mema pa්rawanathawaye uchchasthanayak wu athara, ee haraha rajapaksha mahathata sadakalikawa balaye sitimata nithyanukula awakashaya wiwara kara dunneya.

kolambaa – nuwara pradhana margaye kalaniya dum riya haras margaya mathin idikara thibena jayaraj pranandupulle anusmarana guwan palame ek kotasaka aluthwadiya katayuthu wasaraka pamana kalayak thisse sidukeremin thibima nisa dinapatha nuwara para bhawitha karana dahas ganan magi janathawa saha rathawahana dadi asiruthawayakata pathwa thibe.ema guwanpalame ek manthiruwak (nuwara desata wana manthiruwa ) galawa athi athara ema kotasa aluth wadiya kirima wasarakata wadi kalayak thisse ibi gamanin siduwana bawada ema nisa dinapatha palama aasanne dadi rathawahana thadabadayak pawathina bawada pradeshawasihu pawasathi.kalaniya guwan palama dina 60ka kalayakin sada nima kara ikuth 2008 wasare wiwrutha kala athara keti kalayakinma eya nawatha aluthwadiya kirimata siduwimada wishmayajanaka karunaki.dina 60 kin hadu palama dina 360 giyada thawama aluthwadiya karaganimata nohaki wimada pudumayaki.mema guwanpalama aluth wadiya katayuthu aarambha karana samayedi eya bhara amathyawaraya wuye lakshman kirialla wana athara dan ema amathyashayata adala amathyawaraya wanne kabir hashimya.
